verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Keep my heart amazed, newline let me see Your wonders everyday newline Teach me in Your ways, newline so that i may fear

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You are walking on water, newline You are calling me after newline You are standing beside me now

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You are the maker of Heaven newline you turn my world around newline You're making all things new again newline Through it all I know You are God alone

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Set my heart on fire, newline let me burn with passion for your name newline Take overmy life, newline I surrender now

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, newline You are God Alone newline Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, newline You are God alone
